form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cassidy introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To repeal the medical device tax and the employer and individual responsibility requirements of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Obamacare Mandate Act.

section.header: Repeal of medical device excise tax

subsection.text: Chapter 32 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking subchapter E.

paragraph.text: Subsection (a) of section 4221 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking the last sentence.
Paragraph (2) of section 6416(b) of such Code is amended by striking the last sentence.

subsection.text: The table of subchapter for chapter 32 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking the item related to subchapter E.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to sales after December 31, 2012.

section.text: Sections 1501 and 1502 and subsections (a), (b), (c), and (d) of section 10106 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (and the amendments made by such sections and subsections) are repealed and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 shall be applied and administered as if such provisions and amendments had never been enacted.

Sections 1513 and 1514 and subsections (e), (f), and (g) of section 10106 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (and the amendments made by such sections and subsections) are repealed and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 shall be applied and administered as if such provisions and amendments had never been enacted.
